mapper.select: SELECT m.id id,m.match_Id matchId,m.match_num matchNum,class.Name_JS matchName,t1.Name_J hostTeam, t2.Name_J visitTeam,DATE_FORMAT(m.date_Of_Match,'%H:%i') as dateOfMatch,m.planInfo planInfo,m.status isWin , s.HomeScore homeScore,s.GuestScore guestScore,j.PolyGoal polyGoal,s.MatchState matchState from tb_jc_match m left join schedule s on m.match_id = s.ScheduleID left join jc_schedule j on m.match_id = j.ScheduleID LEFT JOIN team t1 ON s.HomeTeamID = t1.TeamID LEFT JOIN team t2 ON s.GuestTeamID = t2.TeamID LEFT JOIN sclass class ON s.SclassID = class.sclassID where s.scheduleID = m.match_id and j.scheduleID = s.scheduleID and plan_id =#{planId} ORDER BY match_num asc
mapper.update: update tb_jc_match set status=#{status},matchResult=#{score} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.match_Id matchId,m.match_num matchNum,m.match_name matchName,m.home_team hostTeam,m.visiting_team visitTeam,m.date_Of_Match dateOfMatch,m.status,m.matchResult score,m.planInfo planInfo,m.status isWin,s.MatchState matchState from tb_jc_match m LEFT JOIN `schedule` s on m.match_Id=s.ScheduleID where plan_id =#{planId} ORDER BY match_num asc

SELECT class.Name_JS matchName, /*联赛名称*/ sc.MatchTime matchTime, sc.MatchTime2 MatchTime2, case when t.Name_J is null then sc.HomeTeam else t.Name_J end as homeName,/*主队名称*/ case when t2.Name_J is null then sc.guestTeam else t2.Name_J end as guestName,/*客队名称*/ IFNULL(sc.HomeScore,'0') homeScore,/*主队比分*/ IFNULL(sc.GuestScore,'0') guestScore,/*客队比分*/ IFNULL(sc.HomeHalfScore,'0')homeHalfScore,/*主队半场比分*/ IFNULL(sc.GuestHalfScore,'0') guestHalfScore,/*客队半场比分*/ t.Flag homeImg,/*主队图标地址*/ t2.Flag visitImg,/*客队图标地址*/ CASE WHEN sc.MatchState = '0' THEN '未' /*未开始*/ when sc.MatchState in('4','5') then '(完)' /*正在进行*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '2' THEN '中' /*中场*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-1' THEN '完' /*完结*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-14' THEN '推迟' /*推迟*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-12' THEN '腰斩' /*腰斩*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-10' THEN '取消' /*取消*/ when sc.MatchState = '1' then '1' when sc.MatchState = '3' then '3' END AS matchState,/*比赛状态*/ CASE WHEN sc.MatchState = '0' THEN 'notstarted' /*未开始*/ WHEN sc.MatchState IN ( '1', '3', '4', '5' ) THEN 'inprogress' /*正在进行*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '2' THEN 'inprogress' /*中场*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-1' THEN 'finished' /*完结*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-14' THEN 'notstarted' /*推迟*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-12' THEN 'cancelled' /*腰斩*/ WHEN sc.MatchState = '-10' THEN 'cancelledcancelled' /*取消*/ END AS statusType,/*比赛大状态*/ sc.MatchState statusescFK,/*比赛小状态*/ CASE WHEN sc.MatchState IN ( '1', '2' ) THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF( MINUTE, sc.MatchTime2, now( 3 ) ) WHEN sc.MatchState = '3' THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF( MINUTE, sc.MatchTime2, now( 3 ) ) + 45 ELSE '' END AS makeTime,/*比赛进行分钟数*/ sc.HomeTeamID homeId,/*主队Id*/ sc.GuestTeamID visitingId /*客队Id*/ FROM SCHEDULE sc LEFT JOIN sclass class ON sc.SclassID = class.sclassID LEFT JOIN team t ON sc.HomeTeamID = t.TeamID LEFT JOIN team t2 ON sc.GuestTeamID = t2.TeamID WHERE sc.ScheduleID = #{matchId}
select * from tb_jc_match m where m.plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY m.date_of_match asc limit 0,1

SELECT class.Name_JS matchName, t1.Name_J hostTeam, t2.Name_J visitTeam, m.date_of_match dateOfMatch from tb_jc_match m left join schedule s on m.match_id = s.ScheduleID left join team t1 on s.HomeTeamID = t1.TeamID left join team t2 on s.GuestTeamID = t2.TeamID LEFT JOIN sclass class ON s.SclassID = class.sclassID where m.plan_id = #{planId}
